name: merkle-tree
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders:

scripts.compile:all: yarn compile:input-generator && yarn compile:generator && yarn compile:uploader && yarn compile:splitter
scripts.test:all: yarn test:input-generator && yarn test:generator && yarn test:uploader && yarn test:splitter
